item.title: Dalmia Bharat Q2 Results Review - Healthy Volumes Coupled With Cost Discipline: ICICI Securities
item.description: Dalmia Bharat Q2 Results Review - Healthy Volumes Coupled With Cost Discipline: ICICI Securities Volumes grew at a strong rate of 14% YoY (on a low base, ramping-up its newly commissioned plants), implying a 3-year CAGR of 9%.
